content: Facebook has now been invested with such significance in our society that a growing number of employers — and even some psychologists — are of the opinion that people who don't have a profile on this social network are "suspicious".
translations: ita:Facebook adesso è stato investito di tale importanza nella nostra società che un numero crescente di datori di lavoro -
